name: Loop Pad DJ Electro Music
description:
Loop Pad DJ Electro Music, is an APP that simulates an Electronic Music Pad
based on Loops. Become a professional DJ with high quality sounds and loops

In this Dubstep pads you can create and record your own songs, mixes or rhythms.

Connect the device to speakers and play with your friends, set up a party and have fun!.

Even beginners can create amazing music easily with Loop Pad DJ Electro Music.

In addition, it has several electronic drum loops that make it possible to use it
simply as a drum machine.

Characteristics:
- Different types of high quality samples.
- Make your own music, train your fingers and your DJ skills.
- Mix the sounds you want, in real time and without limit.
- Record the music you have created.
- 56 different loops.
